resources.string: Email not available.
Phone number not available.
Invalid email format.
This email address has already been registered.
Device registration has reached the upper limit.
The number of attempts has reached the upper limit within one day. Please try again tomorrow.
Email sending too frequent. Please wait for at least one minute before another try.
Email already bound. Please unbind it first.
The email address is the only login identifier and cannot be unbound.
Email not yet registered.
The maximum number of daily sending attempts has been reached. Please try again tomorrow.
The number of incorrect SMS verification code entries has reached the limit. Please obtain a new one.
SMS sending too frequent. Please wait for at least one minute before another try.
The phone number is already bound to another account. Please try a different one.
Incorrect username or password.
SMS service is currently not available in this region.
This phone has already been registered.
Invalid phone number format.
CAPTCHA codes required.
Invalid CAPTCHA codes.
Incorrect format of the international calling code. It should start with a "+" sign, followed by digits, and have a maximum length of 16 characters.
Invalid phone number.
Incorrect login name format. It can only include letters, numbers, _, ., and @, with a maximum length of 128 characters.
Account not enabled.
Login failed.
The account has been locked due to too many failed login attempts. Please try again after 5min.
Incorrect verification code. Please enter again.
The maximum number of incorrect SMS verification code entries for the day has been reached.
Third-party user login failed.
Verification failed.
Incorrect username format. It should start with a letter and can only include letters, numbers, and _, with a maximum length of 20 characters.
The nickname cannot exceed 100 bytes and should not contain sensitive words.
Incorrect email verification code.
Invalid email address.
Email verification code not sent or has expired.
The maximum number of incorrect email verification code entries for the day has been reached.
The new password is the same as the current password.
Invalid account ID.
Invalid passport ID.
Invalid ID.
The extended information exceeds the maximum limit of 65535 characters.
This account needs to be bound to a phone number or email.
The user has not bound any phone number.
The email address is the only login identifier and cannot be unbound.
Phone number already registered.
Account creation is not allowed. Please bind an existing account.
Your application to join the organization has been submitted.
Failed to submit your application to join the organization.
An organizational account bound to this personal account is found under the organization.
Phone number not registered.
The phone number provided does not match the organizational account, so it is not allowed to use this phone number to modify the organizational account password.
The organizational account is already bound to a personal account.
The same third-party account can only be bound by one person.
Only one third-party account can be bound per person.
The number of binding relationship verification failure within a day has reached the upper limit (5 times).
Account binding relationship not exist.
Please enter a valid account.
You have already submitted an application to join this organization.
There is already a bound organizational account under the specified organization.
There is already a bound organizational account under the specified organization.
There is already a bound organizational account under the specified node.
Operation too frequent. Please try again later.
Weak password. Easily guessable.
Incorrect username or password.
Abnormal user information. Please contact the administrator.
The phone number of the guardian\'s account cannot be the same as that of the current user\'s.
